post.subject: Character Event Warps: Cauldron Contrivance and Sparkling Splendor
post.content:
Hello, Trailblazers!

Character Event Warp Period for this phase is 2024/08/21 12:00:00 – 2024/09/09 15:00:00 (server time) and includes the following content:


▌Cauldron Contrivance Character Event Warp

●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character Jiaoqiu (Nihility: Fire) and 4-star characters Hook (Destruction: Fire), Guinaifen (Nihility: Fire), and Arlan (Destruction: Lightning) will be boosted.


■Event Period

2024/08/21 12:00:00 – 2024/09/09 15:00:00 (server time)


■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character

Jiaoqiu (Nihility: Fire)


■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters

Hook (Destruction: Fire)

Guinaifen (Nihility: Fire)

Arlan (Destruction: Lightning)


▌Sparkling Splendor Character Event Warp

●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character Sparkle (Harmony: Quantum) and 4-star characters Hook (Destruction: Fire), Guinaifen (Nihility: Fire), and Arlan (Destruction: Lightning) will be boosted.


■Event Period

2024/08/21 12:00:00 – 2024/09/09 15:00:00 (server time)


■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character

Sparkle (Harmony: Quantum)


■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters

Hook (Destruction: Fire)

Guinaifen (Nihility: Fire)

Arlan (Destruction: Lightning)


※ Among the above characters, the limited character will not be available in the Stellar Warp event.

※ During the event, the limited 5-star character Jiaoqiu (Nihility: Fire) can only be obtained from the Character Event Warp Cauldron Contrivance while the limited 5-star character Sparkle (Harmony: Quantum) can only be obtained from the Character Event Warp Sparkling Splendor.

※ This Warp is considered a Character Event Warp. The cumulative Warp count for a guaranteed 5-star character in any Character Event Warp will always be carried over to other Character Event Warps, but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Warps.

※ For more information, please head to the Warp screen.


▌Temporary Early Access for Material Stages

●Event Period: 2024/08/21 12:00:00 – 2024/09/16 15:00:00 (server time)

●Event Details: During the event period, Ascension and Trace Material stages for Jiaoqiu (Nihility: Fire) and Sparkle (Harmony: Quantum) will be made prematurely available. If Trailblazers haven't unlocked these stages, they can use the "Interastral Peace Guide - Survival Index" to challenge the stages directly.

●Available This Period:

Stagnant Shadow: Shape of Ire, Shape of Roast

Calyx (Crimson): Bud of Nihility (Alchemy Commission), Bud of Harmony (The Reverie — Dreamscape)


▌Character Trial Event: Aptitude Showcase

●Requirement: Unlock Travel Log

●Event Period: 2024/08/21 12:00:00 – 2024/09/09 15:00:00 (server time)

●Event Details: Trial characters Jiaoqiu (Nihility: Fire), Sparkle (Harmony: Quantum), Hook (Destruction: Fire), Guinaifen (Nihility: Fire), and Arlan (Destruction: Lightning) can be used to experience stages. Upon completing the challenges, Trailblazers can obtain Stellar Jade, Adventure Log, Universal Enhancement Material, and credit.

lang_subject.zh-cn: 角色活动跃迁：「鼎中捭阖」、「焰锦游鱼」
lang_subject.zh-tw: 角色活動躍遷：「鼎中捭闔」、「焰錦游魚」
lang_subject.ko-kr: 캐릭터 이벤트 워프: 「솥에 담긴 계책」, 「화려한 불꽃과 금붕어」
lang_subject.fr-fr: Sauts événements de personnages « Équilibre des saveurs » et « Tourbillon d'étincelles »
lang_subject.pt-pt: Salto Hiperespacial de Evento de Personagem "Invenções em um Caldeirão" e "Esplendor Reluzente"
lang_subject.en-us: Character Event Warps: Cauldron Contrivance and Sparkling Splendor
lang_subject.ja-jp: イベント跳躍・キャラクター：「鼎に見る計略」、「焔錦に遊魚」
lang_subject.th-th: กิจกรรมวาร์ปตัวละคร: "เตาเนรมิตชีวินสมดุล" และ "พลุฉายประกายจรัส"
lang_subject.es-es: Saltos de evento de personaje «Maniobras en el caldero» y «Esplendor resplandeciente»
lang_subject.vi-vn: Bước Nhảy Sự Kiện Nhân Vật: Đỉnh Trung Tách Hợp, Rực Rỡ Lấp Lánh
